name: Null Field
description: You create a stationary null field in a very short (5 unit) radius centered on yourself. All creatures inside the field suffer a penalty dice on all spell checks. The field lasts while you concentrate. If you do not roll at least 2 successes on your spell check, all creatures inside the field (including you) are teleported into a pocket dimension containing only the bubble and its occupants. At the end of each creature's turn while in the pocket dimension, they roll a d6 - on a 5 or higher, they return to their original position in reality. The pocket dimension persists until no living creatures remain inside it.
charge: The radius increases to short (10 units). Creatures inside suffer 2 penalty dice on all spell checks, and spells cannot cross the boundary of the field; spells channeled outside cannot enter, and spells channeled inside cannot exit.
